original_goal: Enhance Dakota Smith blog with new features: client-side search, resume download, RSS feed, related posts, reading progress indicator, social sharing buttons, newsletter signup, dark/light mode toggle, and improved internal linking for SEO
architectural_decisions: Client-side search using FlexSearch for fast, no-backend indexing
Resume download as static PDF file with dynamic generation fallback
RSS 2.0 feed generated at build time for content syndication
Related posts algorithm based on tag similarity and recency
Reading progress indicator using IntersectionObserver for performance
Social sharing buttons using Web Share API with fallback links
Newsletter signup via simple mailto link (no backend integration)
Dark/Light mode toggle with system preference detection and localStorage
Internal linking suggestions based on keyword analysis and tag overlap
All features must maintain Lighthouse 98+ scores and accessibility compliance

colors.accent: High-contrast neon (to be consistent with existing theme)

design_system.style: Neo-brutalist design with thick borders, hard shadows, no blur effects
